name: Fashion Revolution!
description:
Design revolutionary clothing for the superstars and try to get the most flowers from the audience! Compete with up to 4 players to design the best clothing!

Credits

  • Danny Faruqi
  • Mateo de la Rosa 
  • Maddie Haley
  • Gavrielle Vilar

Created during the Gaming Project @ VT Spring 2022 Game Jam
